    • Method Detail

      • criateNewPolyhedronRegular

        public Polyhedron criateNewPolyhedronRegular​(Polygon arevolucionar,
                                             int particoes,
                                             int lado,
                                             double Angulo)
        Creates a default polyhedron based on a polygon(Geratriz) or line, the size is defined by the distance of the object from the axis to revolute.
        Parameters:
        arevolucionar - Base polygon or line.
        particoes - Number of sections in the polyhedron.
        lado - Plan of reference create the polygon.
        Angulo - angle limit to revolute
        Returns:
        Polyhedron created

      • calcCentroid

        public void calcCentroid​(Polyhedron polyhedron)
        Calculates the centroid of the Polyhedron based on the centroid of the polygons
        Parameters:
        polyhedron - The polyhedron to calculate the centroid
